title: very random disconects from games
body:
Ive played one game today with lots of small disconnects and the first time i have ever seen rubberbanding in league of legends, in said same when ever i would disconect it would say "Attempting to reconect" with 50 ms. This happend more times times then ever before. ive had packet loss issues in the past but nothing like this. There was a problem with disconecting players that had the ranked que disabled, i dont think the problem has been entirely fixed

I hope someone from Riot sees this
